knownSolutions.title: Add loading state and conditional rendering
knownSolutions.explanation: Add explicit loading state and render conditionally to handle async data loading
knownSolutions.prevention: Always handle loading/error states when using async data in React

preventionStrategies.name: Custom ESLint rule for optional state access

knownSolutions.title: Install missing package
knownSolutions.explanation: Package not installed in current environment. Install with pip/poetry/conda.

knownSolutions.title: Check virtual environment activation
knownSolutions.explanation: Virtual environment may not be activated or using wrong Python interpreter.

knownSolutions.title: Add to PYTHONPATH
knownSolutions.explanation: Module exists but not in Python path. Add directory to PYTHONPATH.

knownSolutions.title: Clone the value before moving
knownSolutions.explanation: If you need to use the value multiple times, clone it before the first use.

knownSolutions.title: Use references instead of moving
knownSolutions.explanation: Pass references (&T) instead of owned values to avoid moving.

knownSolutions.title: Restructure to avoid multiple uses
knownSolutions.explanation: Redesign logic to only use the value once, or use it last.

patterns.name: Go - Nil Pointer Dereference
patterns.messagePattern: /panic: runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference/

knownSolutions.title: Add nil check before dereferencing
knownSolutions.explanation: Check if pointer is nil before accessing its fields or methods.

knownSolutions.title: Initialize pointer before use
knownSolutions.explanation: Ensure pointer is initialized (e.g., with new() or &Type{}) before use.

knownSolutions.title: Use zero value or default instance
knownSolutions.explanation: For some types, using zero value or a default instance is safer than pointers.

preventionStrategies.name: Static analysis with go vet and nilaway
Code review checklist for nil checks

patterns.name: TypeScript - Type Not Assignable
patterns.messagePattern: /Argument of type '(.*)' is not assignable to parameter of type '(.*)'/

knownSolutions.title: Fix type annotation
knownSolutions.explanation: Correct the type annotation to match expected type.

knownSolutions.title: Add type assertion
knownSolutions.explanation: Use type assertion if you know the type is correct at runtime.

knownSolutions.title: Widen function parameter type
knownSolutions.explanation: Make function accept broader type (e.g., use union type or generic).

knownSolutions.title: Use dict.get() with default value
knownSolutions.explanation: Use dict.get(key, default) to provide fallback when key doesn't exist.

knownSolutions.title: Check key existence with 'in' operator
knownSolutions.explanation: Check if key in dict before accessing: if key in my_dict: ...

knownSolutions.title: Use defaultdict for automatic defaults
knownSolutions.explanation: Use collections.defaultdict to automatically provide default values.

preventionStrategies.name: Pylint check for direct dict access

patterns.name: Rust - Index Out of Bounds
patterns.messagePattern: /index out of bounds: the len is .* but the index is .*/

knownSolutions.title: Use .get() method instead of indexing
knownSolutions.explanation: Use slice.get(index) which returns Option instead of panicking.

knownSolutions.title: Add bounds check before indexing
knownSolutions.explanation: Check if index < slice.len() before accessing.

knownSolutions.title: Use iterator methods instead of indexing
knownSolutions.explanation: Use .iter(), .nth(), or other iterator methods for safer access.

patterns.name: Go - Goroutine Deadlock
patterns.messagePattern: /fatal error: all goroutines are asleep - deadlock!/

knownSolutions.title: Fix channel usage (send/receive mismatch)
knownSolutions.explanation: Ensure every channel send has corresponding receive, and vice versa.

knownSolutions.title: Use buffered channel
knownSolutions.explanation: Use buffered channel (make(chan T, size)) if sender shouldn't block.

knownSolutions.title: Close channel when done sending
knownSolutions.explanation: Call close(ch) after all sends to signal completion to receivers.

preventionStrategies.name: Code review checklist for channel patterns

patterns.name: TypeScript - Cannot Find Module
patterns.messagePattern: /Cannot find module '(.*)' or its corresponding type declarations/

knownSolutions.title: Install missing package
knownSolutions.explanation: Package not installed. Run: npm install <package>

knownSolutions.title: Install type declarations
knownSolutions.explanation: Package installed but types missing. Run: npm install -D @types/<package>

knownSolutions.title: Fix module resolution in tsconfig
knownSolutions.explanation: Check tsconfig.json moduleResolution, baseUrl, and paths settings.

knownSolutions.title: Check object type and available attributes
knownSolutions.explanation: Verify object is correct type and attribute name is spelled correctly.

knownSolutions.title: Use hasattr() before accessing
knownSolutions.explanation: Check with hasattr(obj, 'attr') before accessing optional attributes.

knownSolutions.title: Use getattr() with default
knownSolutions.explanation: Use getattr(obj, 'attr', default) to safely get attributes.

preventionStrategies.name: Use dataclasses or Pydantic for validation
